Name: Hatra
Description: Hatra - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Large fortified city from the Parthian Empire with well-preserved ruins.

Name: Ashur
Description: Ashur (Qal'at Sherqat) - UNESCO World Heritage Site. First capital of the Assyrian Empire.

Name: Samarra Archaeological City
Description: Samarra Archaeological City - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Abbasid capital with the famous spiral minaret.

Name: Erbil Citadel
Description: Erbil Citadel - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient citadel continuously inhabited for over 6,000 years.

Name: Babylon
Description: Babylon - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient city and one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

Name: The Ahwar of Southern Iraq
Description: The Ahwar of Southern Iraq: Refuge of Biodiversity and the Relict Landscape of the Mesopotamian Cities - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Marshlands and archaeological sites.
